spell_tooltip.description: Starsurge grants 2% spell critical strike chance to 8 allies within 40 yards for 18 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Casting Barkskin or Ironbark sprouts thorns on you for 12 sec. When victim to melee attacks, thorns deals 169,636 Nature damage back to the attacker.

Attackers also have their movement speed reduced by 50% for 4 sec.
Using Moonfire on a target already afflicted by Moonfire's damage over time effect deals 35% additional direct damage.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Call down a burst of energy, causing 402,723 Arcane damage to the target, and 136,021 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 8 Astral Power.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 685,663 Astral damage.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 24,007 Nature damage and then an additional 249,455 Nature damage over 18 sec to the primary target and all enemies within 8 yards.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Shift into Cat Form and increase your movement speed by 200%, reducing gradually over 5 sec.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Wrath, Starsurge, and Starfire damage increased by 5%. 

Starsurge's cooldown is reduced by 4 sec and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 342,610 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Blasts targets within 20 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Well-Honed Instincts can trigger up to once every 90 sec.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Cooldown reduced by 60 sec.
Magical damage dealt by your spells increased by 25%.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.
For 15 sec, all single-target healing also damages a nearby enemy target for 20% of the healing done.

Casting 2 Starfires empowers Wrath for 15 sec. Casting 2 Wraths empowers Starfire for 15 sec.

 Eclipse (Solar)
Nature spells deal 15% additional damage and Wrath damage is increased by 40%.

 Eclipse (Lunar)
Arcane spells deal 15% additional damage and the damage Starfire deals to nearby enemies is increased by 30%.
Moonfire and Sunfire damage over time has a chance to call down a falling star, dealing 53,625 Astral damage and generating 2 Astral Power.
Summons a beam of solar light over an enemy target's location, interrupting the target and silencing all enemies within the beam. Lasts 8 sec.
During the first 6 sec of every Eclipse, Shooting Stars fall 200% more often.

Summons a stand of 3 Treants for 10 sec which immediately taunt and attack enemies in the targeted area.

Generates 20 Astral Power.
Moonfire deals 10% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.

While in combat you generate 2 Astral Power every 3 sec.

While out of combat your Astral Power rebalances to 50 instead of depleting to empty.
When Eclipse ends or when you enter combat, enter a Dreamstate, reducing the cast time of your next 2 Starfires or Wraths by 40%.
Your Starfire and Wrath damage has a 35% chance to cause the target to languish for an additional 60% of your spell's damage over 6 sec.
Celestial bodies align, maintaining both Eclipses and granting 10% haste for 15 sec.

Sunfire damage has a chance to grow a magical mushroom at a target's location. After 1 sec, the mushroom detonates, dealing 355,343 Nature damage and then an additional 200,439 Nature damage over 10 sec. Affected targets are slowed by 50%.

Generates up to 20 Astral Power based on targets hit.
Starsurge increases the damage the target takes from your periodic effects and Shooting Stars by 20% for 5 sec. Reapplying this effect extends its duration, up to 20 sec.
Celestial Alignment's cooldown is reduced to 100 seconds and it has two charges, but its duration is reduced by 20%.

Casting Wrath in an Eclipse has a 18% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.

Casting Starfire in an Eclipse has a 25% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.
Your Moonfire, Sunfire, and Stellar Flare deal damage 25% more frequently.
Wrath and Starfire have a 20% chance to cause your next Wrath or Starfire cast during an Eclipse to become Astral and deal 75% additional damage.
Casting a free Starsurge or Starfall grants Solstice for 3 sec.

Starsurge and Starfall grant you 4% Haste for 15 sec.

Stacks up to 3 times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
When you have 3 periodic effects from your spells on a target, your damage and healing on them are increased by 6%.
Every 30th Shooting Star calls down a Full Moon at 60% effectiveness upon its target.
Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 20%, decreasing by 2% every 1 sec.
Starsurge has a chance to summon the Spirit of Goldrinn, which immediately deals 316,573 Astral damage to the target.
Starsurge and Starfall deal 8% increased damage and their cost is reduced by 10%.
Starsurge or Starfall increase your current Eclipse's Arcane or Nature damage bonus by an additional 2%, up to 6%.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Your Moonfire and Sunfire have a chance to summon a Faerie Dragon to assist you in battle for 30 sec.

Incarnation: Chosen of Elune
Reduces the Astral Power cost of Starsurge by 10, and the Astral Power cost of Starfall by 12.

 Convoke the Spirits
Cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Grove Guardians causes your next targeted heal to create 3 Dream Petals near the target, healing up to 3 nearby allies for 159,978. Stacks up to 3 charges.
Your Grove Guardians cast Moonfire on nearby targets about once every 6 sec.
Your maximum mana is increased by 5%.
Your Regrowth protects you, reducing damage you take by 8% while your Regrowth is on you.
Your Grove Guardians' Nourish and Swiftmend spells also apply a Minor Cenarion Ward that heals the target for 404,596 over 10 sec the next time they take damage.
Casting Swiftmend increases your Haste by 10% for 6 sec.

Wrath and Starfire damage increased by 10%. 

Regrowth, Wild Growth, and Swiftmend healing increased by 9%.
Grove Guardians cooldown reduced by 3 sec.

Time elapsed while your major abilities are available to be used or at maximum charges is subtracted from that ability's cooldown after the next time you use it, up to 15 seconds.

Affects Nature's Swiftness, Incarnation: Tree of Life, and Convoke the Spirits.

Every 5 Regrowths you cast makes your next Wrath, Starfire, or Entangling Roots instant and increases damage it deals by 100%.

Every 5 Starsurges you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.
Each of your Grove Guardians increases your healing done by 5% while active.

Heals the target for 613,587 over 17 sec.

You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target.

Call down a burst of energy, causing 395,676 Arcane damage to the target, and 134,478 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 8 Astral Power.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 272,920 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 680,029 Astral damage.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 24,024 Nature damage and then an additional 249,455 Nature damage over 18 sec to the primary target and all enemies within 8 yards.

Casting 2 Starfires empowers Wrath for 15 sec. Casting 2 Wraths empowers Starfire for 15 sec.

 Eclipse (Solar)
Nature spells deal 15% additional damage and Wrath damage is increased by 40%.

 Eclipse (Lunar)
Arcane spells deal 15% additional damage and the damage Starfire deals to nearby enemies is increased by 30%.
Moonfire and Sunfire damage over time has a chance to call down a falling star, dealing 54,072 Astral damage and generating 2 Astral Power.
Summons a beam of solar light over an enemy target's location, interrupting the target and silencing all enemies within the beam. Lasts 8 sec.
During the first 6 sec of every Eclipse, Shooting Stars fall 200% more often.

Summons a stand of 3 Treants for 10 sec which immediately taunt and attack enemies in the targeted area.

Generates 20 Astral Power.
Moonfire deals 10% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.
Your Wrath and Starfire chance to critically strike is increased by 10% and they generate 2 additional Astral Power.

While in combat you generate 2 Astral Power every 3 sec.

While out of combat your Astral Power rebalances to 50 instead of depleting to empty.
When Eclipse ends or when you enter combat, enter a Dreamstate, reducing the cast time of your next 2 Starfires or Wraths by 40%.
Your Starfire and Wrath damage has a 35% chance to cause the target to languish for an additional 60% of your spell's damage over 6 sec.
Celestial bodies align, maintaining both Eclipses and granting 10% haste for 15 sec.
Solar Eclipse increases Wrath's Astral Power generation by 60% and Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage and Astral Power generation by 20% for each target hit beyond the first, up to 60%.
Celestial Alignment's cooldown is reduced to 100 seconds and it has two charges, but its duration is reduced by 20%.

Casting Wrath in an Eclipse has a 18% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.

Casting Starfire in an Eclipse has a 25% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.
Your Moonfire, Sunfire, and Stellar Flare deal damage 25% more frequently.
Wrath and Starfire have a 20% chance to cause your next Wrath or Starfire cast during an Eclipse to become Astral and deal 75% additional damage.

Starsurge and Starfall grant you 4% Haste for 15 sec.

Stacks up to 3 times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Heals the target for 613,587 over 17 sec.

You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target.

Call down a burst of energy, causing 399,675 Arcane damage to the target, and 130,229 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 8 Astral Power.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 272,920 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 687,552 Astral damage.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.

Casting 2 Starfires empowers Wrath for 15 sec. Casting 2 Wraths empowers Starfire for 15 sec.

 Eclipse (Solar)
Nature spells deal 15% additional damage and Wrath damage is increased by 40%.

 Eclipse (Lunar)
Arcane spells deal 15% additional damage and the damage Starfire deals to nearby enemies is increased by 30%.

During the first 6 sec of every Eclipse, Shooting Stars fall 200% more often.

Summons a stand of 3 Treants for 10 sec which immediately taunt and attack enemies in the targeted area.

Generates 20 Astral Power.

Your Wrath and Starfire chance to critically strike is increased by 10% and they generate 2 additional Astral Power.

While in combat you generate 2 Astral Power every 3 sec.

While out of combat your Astral Power rebalances to 50 instead of depleting to empty.
When Eclipse ends or when you enter combat, enter a Dreamstate, reducing the cast time of your next 2 Starfires or Wraths by 40%.

Celestial bodies align, maintaining both Eclipses and granting 10% haste for 15 sec.

Solar Eclipse increases the damage of Wrath by an additional 20%. 

Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage by 15% and the damage it deals to nearby enemies by an additional 30%.
Solar Eclipse increases Wrath's Astral Power generation by 60% and Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage and Astral Power generation by 20% for each target hit beyond the first, up to 60%.
Celestial Alignment's cooldown is reduced to 100 seconds and it has two charges, but its duration is reduced by 20%.

 Convoke the Spirits
Cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.

Affects Nature's Swiftness, Incarnation: Tree of Life, and Convoke the Spirits.

Every 5 Starsurges you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.
Each of your Grove Guardians increases your healing done by 5% while active.

Wild Growth is now instant cast, and when you heal 6 allies with Wild Growth you gain Full Bloom. This effect has a 30 sec cooldown.

Full Bloom
Your next Wild Growth applies Lifebloom to all targets at 100% effectiveness. Lasts for 30 sec.
For 3 sec after leaving Cat Form or Travel Form, you retain up to 25% movement speed.
Your Travel Form movement speed while within a Battleground or Arena is increased by 20% and you always move at 100% movement speed while in Travel Form.

Heals the target for 613,587 over 17 sec.

You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 428,818 Arcane damage to the target, and 147,133 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 272,920 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 23,937 Nature damage and then an additional 249,455 Nature damage over 18 sec to the primary target and all enemies within 8 yards.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Shift into Cat Form and increase your movement speed by 200%, reducing gradually over 5 sec.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.
Blasts targets within 20 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Cooldown reduced by 60 sec.
Magical damage dealt by your spells increased by 25%.
Form a bond with an ally. Your self-healing also heals your bonded ally for 10% of the amount healed. Your healing to your bonded ally also heals you for 8% of the amount healed.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by 8% for 6 sec.

Shred, Rake, and Skull Bash can be used in any form and shift you into Cat Form, if necessary. 

Mangle can be used in any form and shifts you into Bear Form. 

Wrath and Starfire shift you into Moonkin Form, if known.
For 15 sec, all single-target healing also damages a nearby enemy target for 20% of the healing done.

Heals the target for 376,452 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 213,796.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 200%.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 240,193 over 9 sec.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by 8% and critical effect chance is increased by 8%, up to a maximum of 96%.
Regrowth's initial heal has a 40% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.
Increases Omen of Clarity's chance to activate Clearcasting to 5% and Clearcasting can stack 1 additional time.

Abundance now also reduces the cast time of Regrowth by 5% per stack.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 31,008 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.5 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.
The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 12 sec.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 178,045.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 50,869. Lasts 15 sec.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 32,940 over 6 sec.
When Lifebloom blooms, up to 3 targets within your Efflorescence are healed for 102,532.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.

Nourish
Regrowth decreases the cast time of your next Nourish by 33% and causes it to receive an additional 33% bonus from Mastery: Harmony. Stacks up to 3 times.

Grove Guardians
Treants from Grove Guardians also cast Wild Growth immediately when summoned, healing 5 allies within 40 yds for 60,333 over 7 sec.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Wild Growth's healing falls off 30% less over time.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 21,360 over 6 sec.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.

Your abilities are amplified based on your current shapeshift form, granting an additional effect.

Wrath, Starfire, and Starsurge deal 30% additional damage and generate 30,625 Mana.

Bear Form
Ironfur grants 30% additional armor and generates 43,750 Mana.

 Cat Form
Rip, Ferocious Bite, and Maim deal 60% additional damage and generate 174,999 Mana when cast with 5 combo points.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Rejuvenation instantly heals your target for 15% of its total periodic effect and Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Consuming Clearcasting now causes your Regrowth to also cast Nourish onto a nearby injured ally at 60% effectiveness, preferring those with your heal over time effects.

 Nourish:
Heals a friendly target for 594,950.  Receives 300% bonus from Mastery: Harmony.

While your Lifebloom is on yourself, your periodic heals heal 10% faster.

While your Lifebloom is on an ally, your periodic heals on them have a 4% chance to cause it to bloom.
You may Lifebloom two targets at once, but Lifebloom's healing is reduced by 10%.
You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target. Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 2 sec.
Grove Guardians causes your next targeted heal to create 3 Dream Petals near the target, healing up to 3 nearby allies for 156,739. Stacks up to 3 charges.
Your Grove Guardians cast Moonfire on nearby targets about once every 6 sec.
Your maximum mana is increased by 5%.
Your Regrowth protects you, reducing damage you take by 8% while your Regrowth is on you.
Your Grove Guardians increase the healing of your Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom by 10% while active.
Casting Swiftmend increases your Haste by 10% for 6 sec.

Wrath and Starfire damage increased by 10%. 

Regrowth, Wild Growth, and Swiftmend healing increased by 9%.
Your Grove Guardians' healing is increased by 30%.
Healing spells cast with Dream Surge generate an additional Dream Petal.

Every 5 Starsurges you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.

Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 480,109 Astral damage.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.

Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.

Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Wrath, Starsurge, and Starfire damage increased by 5%.

Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 342,610 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Heals the target for 376,452 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 217,470.

May be active on one target at a time.

During Berserk your combo point-generating abilities bleed the target for an additional 150% of their direct damage over 8 sec.
Finishing moves have a 6% chance per combo point spent to grant 10% Haste for 6 sec.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Your finishing moves grant 2 Energy per combo point spent and deal 5% increased damage.

Incarnation: Avatar of Ashamane
During Incarnation: Avatar of Ashamane and for 40 sec after it ends, your Rip and Rake each cause affected enemies to take 3% increased damage from your abilities.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
